comments.body:
<!-- tripwires-review -->

## ✅ Tripwires Review

**Last updated:** 2026-02-22 03:40:57 PT

No violations detected. All changes follow established patterns for adding display fields to the objectives view.

### Tripwires Checked

**Architecture:**
- ✅ Frozen dataclass field additions
- ✅ Gateway fake synchronization (make_plan_row)
- ✅ No subprocess.run patterns outside gateways
- ✅ No Path.home() usage

**CLI:**
- ✅ Rich markup escaping (not applicable - no user input display)
- ✅ Parameter threading (not applicable - no new parameters)

**Testing:**
- ✅ All test files updated for new field
- ✅ Fake mutation tracking maintained

**TUI:**
- ✅ Column addition pattern followed (5-place update)
- ✅ Data contract maintained (PlanRowData ↔ make_plan_row sync)
- ✅ Display strings pre-computed in backend

**Planning:**
- ✅ Metadata field additions (objective_in_flight_display)
- ✅ No metadata block format changes

### Files Reviewed
- `packages/erk-shared/src/erk_shared/gateway/plan_data_provider/real.py`: No violations

<!-- audit-pr-docs -->

## ✅ Audit PR Docs

**Last updated:** 2026-02-22 03:41:13 PT

Found 0 violations across 2 files. No inline comments needed.

### Patterns Checked
✅ Verbatim code blocks — None found
✅ Inaccurate claims — None found
✅ Duplicative sections — None found
✅ Drift risk sections — None found

### Files Reviewed
- `docs/learned/architecture/agent-backpressure-gates.md`: 0 violations
- `docs/learned/planning/next-steps-output.md`: 0 violations

### File Summaries

| File | Verdict | Duplicative % | High Value % | Issues |
|------|---------|---------------|-------------|--------|
| `docs/learned/architecture/agent-backpressure-gates.md` | KEEP | 0% | 85% | 0 |
| `docs/learned/planning/next-steps-output.md` | KEEP | 0% | 70% | 0 |

**Notes:**
- `agent-backpressure-gates.md`: PR changes are cosmetic only (markdown formatting: `*italic*` → `_italic_`, table whitespace). Full doc is high value — conceptual explanations, decision tables, anti-patterns, and a historical example. No code reproduction. Code references (`validate_objective_slug`, `_OBJECTIVE_SLUG_PATTERN`, `InvalidObjectiveSlug` in `naming.py`) verified accurate.
- `next-steps-output.md`: PR changes are cosmetic only (table whitespace alignment). The property/output tables are reference caches documenting the API surface, not verbatim code block copies. All claims verified accurate against `next_steps.py`.

---

### Activity Log
- **2026-02-22 03:41:13 PT**: Re-audited 2 docs after PR update (agent-backpressure-gates.md, next-steps-output.md): both KEEP, 0 violations. PR changes remain cosmetic formatting only.
